Element.Description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms. This identifies the European invoice norm, as well as any extensions applied. The identification may include the version of the specification.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the invoice in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Qualification identifier
Element.Description: Identifier for the qualification document. An transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Reference number
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier. A reference to the procurement process to which this Qualification document is delivered as a response.

Element.Name: Qualification issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the qualification document instance was issued.

Element.Name: Qualification issue time
Element.Description: The time on which the qualification document instance was issued. The time zone has to be informed following the BII Guideline on Data Formats

Element.Name: Call for tender reference
Element.Description: A reference to the call for tender as issued by the contracting body. Creates a link between the call for tender and the tender.

Element.Name: Qualification document version identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the version of the document.

Element.Name: Tender identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of the tender document.

Element.Name: Tender language name
Element.Description: The language used to write the tender.

Element.Name: Economic operator
Element.Description: Any natural or legal person or public entity or group of such persons and/or entities, including any temporary association of undertakings, which offers the execution of works and/or a work, the supply of products or the provision of services on the market. Information about the party submitting the qualification.

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Address information.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in an address. Usually the street name and number or post office box.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". It is recommended to use the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Economic operator legal form
Element.Description: A textual description of the legal form of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact Telefax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Economic operator role code
Element.Description: The role of the economic operator when bidding from a consortium.

Element.Name: Contracting body
Element.Description: The contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or public works using a tendering procedure as described in the applicable directive (Directives 2014/24/EU, 2014/25/EU).

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO).

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a document.

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: A code specifying the type of the document. The mime type code.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: Fyll inn
